titleStmt.title: A compendious dittie wherin the state of mans lyfe is briefely touchid.

notesStmt.note: Colophon reads: Imprinted at London in Fletestrete, by Thomas Berthelet, printer to the kynges highnesse, the thyrde of Ianuary ..
First line: No wyght in this worlde that welthe can attayne,.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
